fullText: Gordon Greenberg directs and Lorin Latarro choreographs, achieving some kind of immortality with all that bubble wrap. Around the edges of this production are a few inspired performances. Raymond J. Lee’s wacky rocker, Tamika Lawrence’s un-PC HR director and Billy Harrigan Tighe’s bleach-blond ukulele-playing male bimbo invariably deliver laughs despite the paper-thin material.

keyPhrases.quote: invariably deliver laughs despite the paper-thin material
Around the edges of this production

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: While the critic praises specific performances and creative elements, the fundamental criticism of 'paper-thin material' and positioning good performances only 'around the edges' suggests the show's core is weak and not worth recommending.
